name: Your Phone Dies in 15 Seconds
description:
You are walking home from work. You are being followed. 

With only 15 seconds left of power on your phone, you can attempt to make contact with people that you think could help you out. 

Is 15 seconds enough time to save your life? 

Features of the game:

  • Seven possible endings.
  • 15 seconds of gameplay, so you can play again and again. 
  • Made by Twine, so you can easily play on your browser.

First game made by Twine and for 'My First Game Jam'.  

Hope you guys enjoy it! If there is anything you think I could improve, please let me know in the comments below!
